entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Earlton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:46 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Precipitation, 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Earlton Airport 10:15 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Precipitation
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure: 100.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: -0.2°C
Wind: W 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. A few flurries beginning early this evening and ending before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing early in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
